name: Google Search
description: Examples of user prompts that require the Google Search tool.

examples.prompt: Can you look up the weather in New York City?
Can you find the capital of France?
Can you search for the latest news?
Can you find the best restaurants in San Francisco?
Can you look up the tallest building in the world?
I want to know how many people live in Tokyo.
Find me the best beaches in the world.
Can you search for the latest movies?
Can you look up the best hotels in Paris?
Can you find the most popular songs in 2024?
What's the current stock price of Apple?
Find the nearest gas station to my location.
What are the symptoms of the common cold?
Show me how to make chocolate chip cookies.
What time does the Super Bowl start?
Find the release date of the next Marvel movie.
What's the exchange rate between USD and EUR?
Show me the flight status for AA1234.
What are the hours for the local library?
Find reviews for the new iPhone.
What's playing at nearby movie theaters?
Show me traffic conditions on I-95.
What's the meaning of the word 'ephemeral'?
Find the lyrics to 'Bohemian Rhapsody'.
What vaccinations do I need for travel to Thailand?
Show me used cars for sale in Chicago.
What's the forecast for hurricane season this year?
Find parking rates at JFK airport.
What are the side effects of melatonin?
Show me how to tie a bow tie.
examples.response: <GOOGLE_SEARCH> how to tie a bow tie tutorial

examples.prompt: Can you look up when the next solar eclipse will be?
Can you look up the nutritional value of quinoa?
Can you look up what museums are open on Mondays in London?
Can you look up the average salary for software engineers?
Can you look up the age requirements for skydiving?
Can you look up when the cherry blossoms bloom in Japan?
Can you look up the best time to plant tomatoes?
examples.response: <GOOGLE_SEARCH> when to plant tomatoes growing season

examples.prompt: Can you look up the history of the Olympic Games?
Can you look up how long it takes to get a passport?
Can you look up the endangered species in the Amazon rainforest?
